narratives: Now that you have some seeds, you can start growing your farm!
Note that your current location is at the market. You can only plant your seeds in your farm.
The action [do plantSeeds] plants ALL of your seeds on the farm.~
feedback: You have succesfully travelled to the farm and planted your seeds using the [do] command
objective: Plant the seeds in your wheat farm
hint:
1.Remember that you have to complete the objective in 1 iteration of the code
2.Enter [do gotoWheatFarm] to drive back to your wheat farm
3.Enter [do plantSeeds] to plant seeds
